title: PMS 2.0 293 - NFL Week 10 Preview, David Feherty, Trent Dilfer, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys discuss last night's Thursday Night Football between the Colts and Titans and try to decide whether or not this is the Colts team we'll get for the rest of the season, how difficult it is to win when you have a poor night on special teams, and everything else from the game. Plus debuts a new segment called #ChatWithPat where he answers some questions, and Pat and AJ Hawk look ahead to the NFL week 10 slate. Also joining the show to chat about the Masters and the aura of Augusta National is former professional golfer and current NBC and Golf Channel analyst, the host of Feherty, friend of the program, David Feherty (25:47-40:13). Next, Super Bowl Champion, 13 year NFL veteran at QB, current Head Coach of Lipscomb Academy, Trent Dilfer joins Pat and AJ Hawk to chat about what it's been like managing coronavirus amongst his team, and how difficult it is to get kids to completely buy in in college, his thoughts on Tua's recent performance against the Cardinals and what he thinks of Justin Herbert and Joe Burrow's performances so far this year, which young coordinator or coach has been helping out his quarterback the most with play design, and much more (55:24-1:16:34). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. Have an incredible weekend. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
